subject: Re:Alcatraz
author: leongbabe@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1209049236
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Definitely investigate the hospital wing in Alcatraz -- in the  operating 
room, a friend of mine have gotten Class A EVPs:  My friend  sensed there was a 
doctor there; what she got was "Dr. Thomas here; I like to  travel; get ready". 
 I was in the hydrotherapy room and got "darkness is  power", which was an 
indirect reply to turning off the lights in order to  capture clearer EVPs.  My 
friend used a Panasonic RR-DR60 recorder; I  captured my EVP on a camcorder.  
Have a great time investigating  Alcatraz!  Sharon



**************Need a new ride? Check out the largest site for U.S. used car 
listings at AOL Autos.      
(http://autos.aol.com/used?NCID=aolcmp00300000002851)
